items.sentence: I\'ve already decided where I\'m going to go.
He has been writing poems since this morning.
He informed me about the changes in the plan.
He looked quite handsome in his suit and tie.
He played golf every day during his vacation.
He promised me to come by five at the latest.
Tom watched the skaters glide across the ice.
Tom knows that Mary doesn\'t know the answer.
I\'m sure Tom will wish he hadn\'t said that.
Tom dated Mary when they were both teenagers.
Tom decided to try sleeping without a pillow.
The ship capsized in the middle of the ocean.
The sun is at the center of our solar system.
The waiter put a new tablecloth on the table.
Find Tom and tell him to come here right now.
Find out whether Tom has relatives in Boston.
For a moment, Tom was too surprised to speak.
Get out of here. I need some peace and quiet.
Do you think we\'ll be able to figure it out?
People used to think that the earth was flat.
People used to write books using typewriters.
People who will lie for you, will lie to you.
I didn\'t understand what Tom said in French.
I didn\'t understand what the professor said.
I didn\'t want Tom to go anywhere without me.
I didn\'t want to be here in the first place.
I didn\'t want to tell Tom about what we did.
I don\'t eat at the school cafeteria anymore.
My brother seems to enjoy himself at college.
My grades have improved since first semester.
Earthquakes and floods are natural disasters.
Everyone in the bar seemed to be with a date.
Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
Have you ever been a witness in a court case?
Have you ever been betrayed by a good friend?
Have you ever brought your dog to this beach?
Have you ever dug a hole as deep as this one?
Have you ever heard that song sung in French?
There\'s no doubt that Tom is lying about it.
Tom has no one to play with, so he\'s lonely.
The committee decided to call off the strike.
The doctor asked Tom what the pain felt like.
The doctor wants Tom to lose a little weight.
The old man was sitting with his arms folded.
The only one who knows how to do that is Tom.
The roads are slippery, so please be careful.
Mary wore a rhinestone necklace and earrings.
My flight was supposed to arrive at 2:30 p.m.
Camping so near the river isn\'t a good idea.
Can I help you find what you\'re looking for?
